TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridTextColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn

summary.span: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载文本内容。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts textual content in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 将数据列显示为文本。Use to display columns of data as text. 下图显示了两种 类型的示例。The following illustration shows an example of two types. ![两 DataGridTextColumns](~/add/media/wpf-datagridtextcolumns.png "两个 DataGridTextColumn")![Two DataGridTextColumns](~/add/media/wpf-datagridtextcolumns.png "Two DataGridTextColumns") 若要创建列，请将其添加到 集合中。To create a column, add it to the collection. 若要填充列，请使用 属性将列绑定到数据。To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the property. 属性应用于在列中创建的 或 元素。The property is applied to the or element created in the column. 每个单元中的元素的 是该单元格所在的行的数据项。The for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in. 因此，若要设置绑定，只需设置 。Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the . 如果要转换数据或 ，可以选择指定 。Optionally, you can specify a if you want to convert the data or the . 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf)。For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf). **请注意** 在非编辑模式下创建 元素，并在编辑模式下创建 元素。**Note** creates a element in the non-editing mode and a element in the editing mode. 可以通过设置属性来自定义 ，如 、、和 。You can customize the by setting properties, such as , , , and . 如果要显示其他类型的数据， 提供以下列类型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |列类型Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示布尔数据。Use to display Boolean data.| 如果要使用 中的其他控件，可以通过使用 来创建自己的列类型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个具有自定义文本列并使用 XML 数据作为源的 。The following example creates a that has customized text columns and uses XML data as the source. 本主题前面的插图演示如何显示此代码。The illustration earlier in this topic shows how this code is displayed. 有关绑定到 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用 XMLDataProvider 和 XPath 查询绑定到 Xml 数据](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xml-data-using-an-xmldataprovider-and-xpath-queries)。For more information about binding to XML data, see [How to: Bind to XML Data Using an XMLDataProvider and XPath Queries](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xml-data-using-an-xmldataprovider-and-xpath-queries). [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TextColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_textcolumn/CS/mainwindow.xaml#1)]

value.span: 列中单元格内容的字体系列。

span.span: The font family of the content for cells in the column.
The registered default is .

value.span: 有关可能影响该值的因素的信息，请参见 。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当模板将属性用作参数时， 属性才会确定此列中控件的字体。The property determines the font for controls in the column only when the template uses the property as a parameter.
